item.title: Adding callouts and collapsable secation in 'Hugo'
item.description: What is Hugo shortcode? A Hugo shortcode is a reusable and customizable template-like feature Shortcodes are written using Hugo’s templating language (based on Go templates). They are placed in the layouts/shortcodes directory of your Hugo project.
